forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 18C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 67F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High around 15C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High around 60F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
